URBANA, ILLINOIS
April 20, 1954
Mrs. L. C# McNabb
Director of Broadcasting
MXlikin University
1184 West Main
Decatur, Illinois
Deer Mfcs. McHabbt
I am very happy to inform yon officially that the Board of Directors of
HAEB has approved your application for associate membership In our organ¬
ization.
You will now be receiving the HAEB newsletter, additional publications
of interest, and many other things.
Ion should of course, feel free to write us at any time for any informa¬
tion concerning educational broadcasting.
Under separate cover w© are sending you a copy of the HAEB Radio-TV Bib¬
liography which we hope will be helpful.
Perhaps the greatest good of an HAEB membership is the associations you
form. It*® good to know that others are having the same problems you are
and how they are solving them. It has been the tradition within HAEB to
exchange this sort of information on a friend-to-friend basis. You*11
find lots of friends in the HAEB.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJStrtb
c.e.t Ausmus
